short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JUST extension makes it easier for you to browse JUST website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JUST extension
this extension will make it a lot easier to browse the JUST student services website with a lot of tools 
what you can do with it? 
1- Auto course evaluation, with just one click 
تقييم المواد والمدرسين بسرعة كبيرة
2- New dark theme for the website
مظهر اللون الداكن, مريح للعين وبسيط
3-Registration helper
مساعد التسجيل
4-GPA Calculator 
حاسبة المعدل
And more.
